name: Naz
text: The owner Mahmood is very polite, and the prices were pretty reasonable. He honoured the Groupon promo in store! He assured me that the meat is Zabiha Halal and recommended the Buffalo Chicken and Steak and Cheese pizzas. We also ordered ‚Ä¶More

name: Charles Sturdivant
text: Ordered over the phone and had my food delivered. It arrived hot and fresh and was greeted by a very nice gentleman. When my order was taken I was spoke to like a human being and not just some customer. The food was Delicious. These things are what makes a great establishment! I will order from here again!

name: Melody Sepehrar
text: Awesome pizza and customer service. I always order from them because I love it so much! Try their salads too, they're great.

name: Brian Korten
text: First time there, everyone was so welcoming and nice. Pizza tasted delicious as well! I've always been fond of Pizza Boli's and am really happy to have a store like this one near enough to patron.

name: Daniel Tobias
text: The store isn't anything special, but the man working the register and making üçï s (he looked like the manager) was super polite and appreciative. I came in a little under an hour before they closed, and I just felt bad, because they ‚Ä¶More

name: Shmurda Inc.
text: The food was pretty good but the service wasnt the best (not very welcoming). I ordered a large greek pizza on a monday and they fail to let me know that i get an another pizza free until i saw their promo on their menu after i ordered. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian J
text: Our two pizzas and salad were tasty. Only issues I have is that the toppings on pizzas were skimpy and the salad was mostly lettuce with a tomato slice or two added (maybe there were other small  ingredients added but hard to find)

name: Kate Smith
text: Delicious pizza! Sauce is one of the best I've had....usually the flavor gets lost in the toppings but this one stands out. Owner confirmed only pork-free meat is used in his store. The "meatster pizza" was terrific! Same for Greek pizza. ‚Ä¶More

name: Mohammed Haque
text: I order from this place multiple times because it's hard to find a halal fast food restaurant. I call an hour ahead so when I come I can just pick up my order. When I go there they tell me to sit another 15-20 minutes and I see that they ‚Ä¶More

name: Ashley Thomas
text: Very disappointing, ordered online they told me 45 mins, after an hour I check they said out for delivery, called and they said sorry they never pulled order, said I could cancel if I was unhappy, didn't express any sympathy of us waiting OVER 2 hours for food. Take your money elsewhere staff are RUDE!!!!

name: jaime perez
text: Great steak and cheese. Pizza is good but sometimes it isn't consistent.

name: Alex Brown
text: Buffalo chicken pizza could be the best I've ever had

name: Elizabeth Murphree DC CCST LAc RMT
text: Food good needed more sauce. Salad great.

name: wayne roberts
text: Best steak and cheese in n.v.a. and pizza is also the best.  I eat here at least 3 times a week..

name: Muhammad Imran
text: Meatster pizza <3 Good one. Would recommend to others.

name: Matt
text: First time I called I asked what types of specialty pizza they had. They told me to hang up and check their menu online-rude! Telling him I was hiking and couldn't get the internet, they still wouldn't tell me! I called back 5 times and ‚Ä¶More

name: Rozh Kamal
text: You should try them food its awesome

name: Bilal Chaudhry
text: Classic Boli's fare, with fantastic service.  GIANT WINGS!!!

name: alihan Tamer
text: Terrible customer service!!! He is very rude who answered my call, should be he was owner. Guys, stay away from this place. He has to learn communication. 21. Century right?

name: Rafiullah Safi
text: Really really bad service, I haven't seen my life. Said 15 min spent 35 min even no test as well

text: Ordered lasagna via their website. Over an hour later, it still hadn't arrived. Completely undependable.

text: The Mac and Cheese was terrible. I should have told the owner that i do not have time for this....
